zone.line: And of the Earth every highest pleasure
And all the Near & all the Distant
Contents not his deeply moved breast
The Lord
Since he to me now also only confusedly serves
So will I him soon in the clearness lead.
Known still the gardner, when the shrub he plants
That bloom & fruit the following year adorn
Mephistopheles
still
What wager ye? Then shall ye not lose!
When you to me permission give
Him my way safe to lead
The Lord
So long he on the Earth lives
That So long shall it be to you not forbidden
It errs Man so long he struggles
Mephistopheles
Then thank I you! then with the dead
Have I myself never willingly caught.
to me
To most love I the full fresh cheeks
